div.p: Kyle Soska Carnegie Mellon University ECE / Cylab ksoska@cmu.edu
Nicolas Christin Carnegie Mellon University ECE / Cylab nicolasc@cmu.edu
Amazon.com of illegal goods Drugs, CCs & Fake IDs, Weapons, etc. No Child Porn
Hidden Website (Tor Hidden Service, I2P) Customers
No cost of creation No information needed
Vendors Vendor bonds required Often invite only Public feedback history
Payments (Bitcoin) Marketplaces often act as escrow agent Escrow sometimes acts as a mixing service
Received Excellent seller, would do business with again. A++++
Stealth Indistinguishable from real user Random delays, scrape slowly Popular User Agent Browse website normally
Complete and instantaneous Dynamic marketplace, moving target Scrape quickly Site availability as low as 70%
Rate Limits Cookie Timeout User Account Suspension
35 Marketplaces 1,908 scrapes total 3.2 TB 27 331,691 pages per scrape 11/22/11 present
Feedback is often mandatory! Acceptable proxy for sales volume
Unreliable dynamic marketplaces that take days to scrape
Idea: Estimate population via mark and recapture
Assumption: Each feedback corresponds to precisely one transaction
Anonymity requires strictly enforced feedback system to establish reputation
Possible on many marketplaces to purchase several quantities of item and leave 1 feedback, conservative estimate
Assumes that there exists some stable ratio between transaction volume and # listings
# for The Evolution Marketplace in July
Problem: 100s of observations of same feedback Double counting leads to over-estimations Feedback may be updated, deleted
Feedbacks are useful to vendors but are destroyed when the listing is removed
Vendors raise listing prices prohibitively high
Need to look at historical price for item
Heuristic A: Remove all free things Remove all things > $100,000 Calculate median of remaining prices Remove everything greater than 5x median Remove things less than 25% of median
Heuristic B: Remove all things > $100,000 Remove upper quartile Remove everything greater than 100x cheapest non-zero price
What is being sold? Product labels are often unavailable or inaccurate
Classifier trained from Agora and The Evolution Marketplace Listing title and description concatenated and tfidf 1,941,538 unique samples, 162,198 words tokenized Predicts 16 class labels
Do vendors specialize in what they are selling? Do vendors sell what they make? Does a single online presence sell goods for several
Coefficient of Diversity [, ] 0 all sales from same category 1 equal sales from each category Only vendors > $10,000 total sales considered
Trial evidence GX226A, GX227C places Silk Road 1 weekly volumes at $475,000/week in late March 2012, consistent with our estimates
Administrator reports Silk Road 2 daily volumes of around $250,000 in September 2014, similar to our estimated $270,000
Leaked Agora vendor page shows sales total on June 5, 2014 to be $3,460, our observations yielded $3,408
Anonymous Marketplaces are very easy to setup and use and have wide customer appeal
Anonymous Marketplace ecosystem transacts in excess of $500,000 / day
Anonymous Marketplaces are primarily used (~75%) for recreational drugs
Anonymous Marketplace ecosystem has historically recovered from takedown efforts and scams
Anonymous Marketplaces are controlled by small set of highly influential vendors
, = % of vendor js total sales that came from
